item.title: Fixed potholes have failed already, 24th April
item.description:
Recently fixed potholes have failed already. Whatever was used to fill them is all over the road, creating piles of gravel that makes it very slippery and dangerous for cyclists turning in to the cycle path from the a40. Please fix them properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlestaine Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights, 23rd April
item.description:
This is the 3rd night we have been without street lights. Being on the edge of town it is pitch black outside with no street lights. We have lots of road works in this area & it is making driving very dangerous. This is Pillley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham. It is also on Leckhampton rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Good enhancer cylinders-2 boxes & 1 bag, 23rd April

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 23rd April
item.description:
